com.alphaking.controller.personal

类 PersonalTwitterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alphaking.controller.personal.PersonalTwitterController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/personal")
public class PersonalTwitterController
extends java.lang.Object
    登录用户的与微博动态相关的请求处理器
    作者:
    lindanpeng
